## Reverser

```{r}
# Definition here: 
reverser <- function(word){
  letters <- (strsplit(word,""))
  x<- rev(letters[[1]])
  paste(x,collapse="")
}
```

Test Statements
```{r}
# Test Statements
reverser("computer")
reverser("cat")
```

## Scrambler

```{r}
# Definition Here
Scrambler <- function(word){
  letters <- (strsplit(word,""))
  x<- sample(letters[[1]])
  paste(x,collapse="")
}
```

```{r}
# Test Statements
Scrambler("hello")
```
